definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Ministry of Land and Resources (MLR), formed in 1998

sentences.english: Shariputra, the Land of Utmost Happiness is crowned in merits, virtues and splendors such as these.
sentences.chinese: 舍利弗，極樂國土，成就如是功德莊嚴。

sentences.english: How, if at all, should the Department of Homeland Security be restructured?
sentences.chinese: 如果要重組國土安全部的話，應該如何重組？

sentences.english: The Ministry of Land and Resources has charged added-value fees for land reserves.
sentences.chinese: 國土資源部已開始對“囤地”徵收增值地價。

sentences.english: The entire nation raised up and drove the enemy soldiers out from their homeland.
sentences.chinese: 整個民族奮起反抗，把敵兵從國土上趕了出去。

sentences.english: Land of afforest of large area afforestation is the one big task that crosses century China.
sentences.chinese: 大面積植樹造林綠化國土是跨世紀中國的一大課題。

sentences.english: Everythingthe light touches is our kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 陽光普照之處皆是我們的國土。

sentences.english: Only the mighty God has the power on this dark land to lighten it.
sentences.chinese: 只有萬能的上帝纔有能力在這個愚昧的國土上教化它。

sentences.english: Housing units without control of the management of housing land by the Housing Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 無管房單位的棄管房屋由各國土房屋分局負責。

sentences.english: If there are beings who hear this teaching, they should aspire to be born in that land.
sentences.chinese: 若有衆生，聞是說者，應當發願，生彼國土。

sentences.english: Note:Data in this table comes from the Land and Resources Department.
sentences.chinese: 本表數據來源於自治區國土資源廳。

sentences.english: Geological explor(?)tion is regarded by the author as a basis for pre-phase programming and management of natural resource.
sentences.chinese: 本文認爲地質勘查是國土規劃和整治的前期基礎工作。

sentences.english: What’s more, Japan is a small-size country with a large population and this increases the pressure on them.
sentences.chinese: 再加上日本國土面積小人口多，這加重了他們的壓力。

sentences.english: What nation hath not inherited her kingdom, and gotten of her spoils?
sentences.chinese: 那一個民族沒有佔領過這國土，沒有來劫掠分贓？

sentences.english: Now, Sun Wensheng has been appointed national secretary of the party group.
sentences.chinese: 現在，孫文盛已經被任命爲國土資源部黨組書記。

sentences.english: The Secret Service is part of the Department of Homeland Security.
sentences.chinese: 特勤局隸屬於國土安全部。

sentences.english: Prohibiting deployment and stationing of nuclear weapons on their national territories.
sentences.chinese: 禁止在其國土上部署和存放核武器。

definition: Anning District of Lanzhou City 蘭州市|兰州市[Lan2 zhou1 Shi4], Gansu/Anning City, to the west of Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan
to seize/to capture/to wrest control of
to ignore/to neglect/to treat with contempt
nothing other than/to differ in no way from/the same as/to amount to
